attributes.action: DO NOT pay the European Union penny.
attributes.additional_details:
On 31 December 2006, Britain made a final payment of about $83m (£45.5m) and thereby discharged the last of its war loans from the US. By the end of World War II Britain had amassed an immense debt of £21 billion.
(History of the British national debt - Wikipedia)
attributes.background:
We have given enough to Europe?
Stop the Tory Government from giving into EU pressure and handing over our money against the wishes of the UK citizens.
Let Democracy work and walk away.
